name: CloudStorage_GetCloudStorageProviders
description: Retrieves the list of cloud storage providers enabled for the account and the configuration information for the user.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

userId.description:
The ID of the user to access.

**Note:** Users can only access their own information. A user, even one with Admin rights, cannot access another user's settings.

redirectUrl.description:
The URL the user is redirected to after the cloud storage provider authenticates the user. Using this will append the redirectUrl to the authenticationUrl.

The redirectUrl is restricted to URLs in the docusign.com or docusign.net domains.

$ul: **storageProviders**: An Array containing the storage providers associated with the user.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
